items.title: General Dialogue & Q&A
items.description: Models for open-ended conversations and answering various questions.

items.title: Content Generation
items.description: Create articles, stories, marketing copy, and other text content.

items.title: Summarization & Extraction
items.description: Extract key information or generate summaries from long texts.

items.title: Translation & Localization
items.description: Translate text between multiple languages.

items.title: Rewriting & Polishing
items.description: Improve the grammar, style, and clarity of existing text.

items.title: Code Generation & Assistance
items.description: Generate, complete, and explain code.

items.title: RAG & Knowledge Base Q&A
items.description: Retrieval-Augmented Generation for Q&A with external knowledge bases.

items.title: Data Analysis & Insights
items.description: Analyze structured data and provide business insights.

items.title: Entity & Relation Extraction
items.description: Identify entities and extract relationships between them from text.

items.title: Sentiment & Intent Analysis
items.description: Analyze sentiment and user intent in text.

items.title: Time Series Forecasting
items.description: Predict future trends based on historical data.

items.title: Image Generation
items.description: Generate images from text descriptions.

items.title: Image Editing & Restoration
items.description: Edit, restore, or enhance existing images.

items.title: Video Generation & Editing
items.description: Generate or edit video content.

items.title: Speech Recognition & Synthesis
items.description: Convert speech to text or text to speech.

items.title: Music & Sound Generation
items.description: Create music or generate various sound effects.

items.title: Workflow Automation
items.description: Automate repetitive tasks and business processes.

items.title: Enterprise Document Management
items.description: Intelligently process and manage internal enterprise documents.

items.title: Intelligent Recommendation
items.description: Provide personalized recommendations based on user preferences.

items.title: Model Fine-tuning
items.description: Fine-tune models on specific tasks or datasets.

items.title: Model Deployment & Inference
items.description: Efficiently deploy models and provide inference services.
